COURSES: At this stage, students can choose and enroll in elective courses. If the number of available seats in a course is limited, enrollment is processed on a first-come, first-served basis. After this stage ends, the student can no longer select or change elective courses.
GROUPS: At this stage, students can enroll in a selected group (if there is more than one) for courses in their individual study plan, as well as transfer from one group to another. If a group has no available seats, enrollment is not possible. After this stage ends, the student can no longer enroll in or transfer between groups.
CORRECTION: At this stage the student may withdraw from an elective course in case of a schedule conflict, enroll in an elective course, or change groups.
CLOSED: At this stage, enrolling in courses or groups is not possible. If issues arise with the individual study plan, please contact the dean's office specialists.
